title: The developer/owner shall be entitled for the Built-Up Area (BUA) in lieu of cost of construction against handing over of built up amenity as per Note (d) of Regulation 17(1) in case of clause 3,4 & 5 above
clause_text: The developer/owner shall be entitled for the Built-Up Area (BUA) in lieu of cost of construction against handing over of built up amenity as per Note (d) of Regulation 17(1) in case of clause 3,4 & 5 above.
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)

source_pdf.text_snippet: The developer/owner shall be entitled for the Built-Up Area (BUA) in lieu of cost of construction against handing over of built up amenity as per Note (d) of Regulation 17(1) in case of clause 3,4 & 5
